exercises.title: Depth abdominal breathing
exercises.description: Sit up straight and close your eyes. Then inhale 5 seconds and exhale 5 seconds. Inhale through your nose and exhale through your mouth. It is important to breath rhythmically and to concentrate fully on your breathing. Repeat this exercise till the strain falls off!

exercises.title: Strain - Relaxation
exercises.description: Inhale slowly through your nose. Then contract all your muscles as much as you can. Hold your breath for 10 - 20 seconds. Afterwards exhale and relax your body.
